Brawler.desc: Brawlers are monstrous fighters in battle that deal a lot damage.

Knight.desc: Heal and gain a new set of soups for every takedown.
Knight.passive_ability: For every takedown you are healed to maximum health and refill your inventory with soups.
Knight.details1: If the refill variable is set higher than the inventory capacity, then refill to maximum inventory capacity.
Knight.details2: If the heal variable is set higher than the health capacity, then set health to maximum health capacity.

Alpha.desc: Alpha becomes a lot more fierceful with the pack.
Alpha.active_ability: Summon 6 wolves that attacks your last hit target.
Alpha.details1: While the ability is active, both you and your wolves gain speed 1 during the duration of the ability.
Alpha.details2: The wolves should be able to damage themselves from the Hedgehog passive ability. (20hp * 0.10% pre-mitigation max health dmg = 2hp | 2/2 = 1 heart.)

Viking.desc: Viking is a relentless force driven by rage, feared amongst everyone.
Viking.passive_ability: Weakens opponents for every 20th hit onto you for 6 seconds.
Viking.active_ability: Summon a lightning bolt on the selected target and deal 50% of their current health as pre-mitigation damage and set opponent ablaze for 8 seconds.
Viking.details1: The weakness applies onto the enemies after the enemies have hit Viking 20 times, the weakness application caps at Weakness 10.

Basilisk.desc: Basilisk strives in long term battles poisoning opponents.
Basilisk.passive_ability: Every 10th hit poison enemies for 3 seconds and grants you speed 1 for the same duration.
Basilisk.details1: Whilst the enemy is poisoned, antiheal is applied, halve the health restoration from soups for the duration of the poison.
Basilisk.details2: Hits should be registered hits, not hits that was blocked by the hit delay cooldown that only shows particles.

Warrior.desc: For every takedown Warrior is granted great buffs.
Warrior.passive_ability: For every takedown you are granted strength 1, speed 1, resistance 1 and regeneration 3 for 6 seconds.
Warrior.details1: The great buffs resets on takedown, it does not stack, also gain protection 1 on your helmet.
Warrior.details2: Immune to all negative effects during great buffs.

Slayer.desc: Slayer is unmatched in raw brutal strength.
Slayer.passive_ability: Restores 1 heart when successfully landing a critical strike.
Slayer.active_ability: Grants 2 additional levels of sharpness on the sword for 10 seconds.
Slayer.details1: The critical strike should only be registered critical strike hits, and NOT unsuccessful hits that shows particles and does not hurt the opponent because of the hit delay cooldown.

Challenger.desc: Challenger may weaken a soul until either one is vanquished.
Challenger.passive_ability: If the Challenger successfully kills their target, their weapon will deal pre-mitigation damage for 7 seconds
Challenger.active_ability: You weaken your selected target until either one of you dies, all current effects will be removed from both players.
Challenger.details1: If either one dies, the weakness effect is removed from the selected target and respective effects removed will be restored.
Challenger.details2: Cooldown will not begin to count down until either of you have been slain.
Challenger.details3: Cannot remove Great Buffs from Warrior.
Challenger.easteregg1: If Challenger kills Warrior, Challenger is granted Great Buffs for 12 seconds.
Challenger.easteregg2: If Challenger kills Slayer, Challenger is granted an additional sharpness level on their weapon permanently.
Challenger.easteregg1_reverse: If Warrior kills Challenger, Warrior is granted Great Buffs for 12 seconds instead of 6.
Challenger.easteregg2_reverse: If Slayer kills Challenger, Slayer is granted an additional sharpness level on their weapon permanently.
Challenger.easteregg_rule: Permanent Easter Eggs can only be done once for every Challenger.

Shaman.desc: Shaman channels the spirit realm to enter spirit mode.
Shaman.passive_ability: Heal 20% of damage dealt post-mitigation and reduce all incoming damage by 1 heart.
Shaman.active_ability: You slow your target and steal all enchantments and positive effects from your target.
Shaman.details1: Does not steal negative effects from target.
Shaman.details2: Puts ability on cooldown even if the target has nothing to steal, since slow is still applied.
Shaman.details3: Effects stolen does not expire, only restored by exiting spirit mode.
Shaman.details4: Refresh the duration of spirit mode by hitting a player.
Shaman.details5: Shaman is unable to steal Great Buffs from Warrior.
Shaman.details6: Cooldown will start when the duration has ended.

Vampire.desc: Vampire sustains by draining the lifeforce of weak opponents.
Vampire.passive_ability: Gain speed for every drain. Damage and health restoration is doubled at or under 4 hearts.
Vampire.active_ability: Drains health from the selected target and heals you for the same amount.
Vampire.details1: Damage and health restoration is doubled when the selected target is at or under 4 hearts.
Vampire.details2: Will not spawn with any soups and also cannot use soups to restore health and can neither can access soup signs to refill.

Duelist.desc: Specialises in aggressive playstyles to outplay an opponent.

Fisherman.desc: Fisherman may teleport hooked enemies to them or may leap forward on marked location.
Fisherman.active_ability: Teleports hooked players to your location or leap forward.
Fisherman.details1: Teleported players will be facing the direction you are facing when teleporting them.

Bomber.desc: Bomber deals massive damage in an area with explosions.
Bomber.details1: Spawns with 16 TNT, they cannot destroy terrain.
Bomber.details2: Grant 8 TNT for every takedown with a cap of 64.
Bomber.details3: Bomber is granted Blast Protection 10 on boots.

Ninja.desc: Ninja is able to quickly position themselves behind their target in the blink of an eye.
Ninja.passive_ability: After teleporting, you dodge all incoming attacks and projectiles for 1 seconds.
Ninja.active_ability: SHIFT to Teleport 1 block behind your last hit target or closest target.
Ninja.details1: The ability should not be put on cooldown if no one is in range.
Ninja.details2: Spawns with 8 enderpearls, every takedown grants a new enderpearl with a cap of 8.
Ninja.details3: Enderpearls does not exclude passive from being applied.
Ninja.details4: Enderpearl shall override any item to avoid player exploitation.
Ninja.details5: Ninja is granted Feather Falling 10 on boots.

Monkey.desc: Monkey is a trickster whom has mastered the art of confusion.
Monkey.active_ability1: Change opponents currently held item to another slot in their hotbar.
Monkey.details1: If Monkey swaps more health than his maximum health can hold, Monkey will have his current health set to his maximum health. This avoids gaining effect bonuses.
Monkey.details2: Regular invisibility effect, not vanished like Rogue, therefore can still be hit during the duration of the ability.

Hyper.desc: Hyper is insanely agile on their feet.
Hyper.passive_ability: Speed level increases for every 3rd hit with a cap of level 6 and decreases back to level 2 after 4 seconds of not hitting any players.
Hyper.details1: Does NOT stack with mobs, ONLY players, the hit should be a successful registered hit, and not a hit that was blocked because of the hit delay cooldown that only shows particles.

Rogue.desc: A master of stealth may go completely invisible.
Rogue.active_ability: Go completely invisible/vanish for 8 seconds, while invisible your attacks deal bonus damage of the target's missing health, you also gain speed 2 for the duration you are invisible.
Rogue.details1: Should be rendered invisible, cannot be seen by any particles or projectiles, therefore cannot be hit themselves until the duration runs out.
Rogue.details2: Can still damage themselves from Hedgehog passive ability.

Phoenix.desc: Phoenix is free to dash forwards in any direction.
Phoenix.passive_ability: Grants 2 hearts of absorption for every dash for 3 seconds.
Phoenix.details1: May not launch themselves upwards or downwards if applicable.

Pirate.desc: Pirate thrives on collecting rewards and gold from plundering enemies.
Pirate.passive_ability: For every takedown you are granted double gold and 3 golden apples.
Pirate.active_ability: Consuming a golden apple will cleanse all debuffs and be immune to abilities for 3 seconds.

Ranged.desc: Damage opponents from afar whilst keeping your distance.

Inferno.desc: Inferno shoots flaming arrows that sets opponents ablaze on hit.
Inferno.passive_ability: Every third arrow ignites an opponent for 6 seconds if hit.

Scout.desc: Scout has withering arrows which denies healing.
Scout.passive_ability: Every third hit on the same target applies wither effect.
Scout.details1: Whilst the enemy is withered, antiheal is applied, all health restoration from soups is denied for the duration of the wither.

Artillery.desc: Artillery has impeccable damage but has to be careful.
Artillery.passive_ability: Get one arrow every 5 seconds, only if you don't have one already.
Artillery.details1: Refund the arrow if a player was hit.

Snowman.desc: Snowman may throw snowballs rapidly to apply slowness while being quick on their feet.
Snowman.passive_ability: You are granted speed and your snowballs deals 1.5 hearts of pre-mitigation damage, applying slowness 1 on opponents for 1 second.
Snowman.details1: Replenish 16 snowballs when you run out of them by using your last snowball.
Snowman.details2: Spawns with 16 snowballs and cannot gain more than 16 snowballs from replenishes.

Star.desc: Stars are forged with immense density emitting powerful darkness.
Star.passive_ability: Apply a strong slowness and blindness every 30th hit for 5 seconds.
Star.active_ability: Stun nearby players in a radius of 5 blocks for 3 seconds, if at least one player is stunned, restore full health.
Star.details1: The stunned players may not be able to move at all, however they should be able to freely move their direction they are facing and still damage nearby players.
Star.details2: Do not restore any health if nobody was stunned in the area, and put the ability on cooldown.
Star.details4: Do not restore health if Pirate was immune, will still restore health if Pirate cleanses it afterwards, since the stun is applied first.

Dragon.desc: Dragon blasts targets aflame in an area.
Dragon.passive_ability: Nearby opponents are dealt 5% max health pre-mitigation damage every second.
Dragon.active_ability: Blasts enemies in a radius of 8 blocks to deal 4 hearts of pre-mitigation damage and also ignites blasted opponents for 4 seconds.

Hedgehog.desc: Hedgehogs are extremely resiliant and shrugs damage off with ease.
Hedgehog.passive_ability: Thorn 50% of the opponents pre-mitigated melee damage back to the opponent.
Hedgehog.details1: Does not thorn projectile damage only melee damage.

Juggernaut.desc: Juggernauts are able to face tank anything.
Juggernaut.passive_ability: Increase health by 2 hearts every takedown.
Juggernaut.active_ability: Gain regeneration 5 for 10 seconds with a cooldown of 50 seconds.
Juggernaut.details1: Starts with slowness 1 and 3 rows of hearts via health boost effect and instantly healed.
Juggernaut.details2: Health boost stacking using Health boost effect.
Juggernaut.details3: For every takedown, the player is instantly healed to the new current max health.
Juggernaut.details4: When active_ability is active, slowness is removed for the duration.
